Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2008 11:53AM Lyndy-Loo wrote: Hi Bikerlady, stress causes cancer and many other diseases.  Don't stress.  I've had a mastectomy on my left breast and my sister who is 5 years older than me goes for a regular mammogram once a year.  She's clear.  My Granny (who lived till the ripe old age of 93) had breast cancer in her left breast and so did my Aunt (my Mom's younger sister).  My Aunt is now 75 and still living.  She also had a mastectomy at the age of 40 (same as me).  Her daughter is clear.  No answers to the question, all I'm trying to say is don't believe that just because your brother has been diagnosed that you will also be postiive.  Take care.   Lyndy-Loo
Posts.Title: Completely Baffled Bikerlady tygress
